channel.title: Really easy Request!
channel.description:
Im just lookin for a simple script that will contaniously click ctrl x & s at the same time... its for a game i like and that is really easy to cheat at :D (atleast for me)
Thanks, MoO
Not for runescape

item.title: Really easy Request!
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

program New;

const
lenght=1000;// time between pressing of keys
time2=10;// time to keep the keys pressed
begin
repeat
keydown(17)
keydown(getkeycode('w'))
keydown(getkeycode('s'))
wait(time2)
keyup(17)
keyup(getkeycode('w'))
keyup(getkeycode('s'));
wait(lenght);
until(isfkeydown(11)=true)
keyup(17)
keyup(getkeycode('w'))
keyup(getkeycode('s'))
end.

Well, I guess that time is a function, even though I have never hear of it, and I changed the constant, it works perfectly now.

Read full topic

@MoO wrote:

Ok, Thanks

I would write myself but i put all my time into aryan and quit runescape so i kinda lost the point in learning scar scripting.

Also answered your question about that topic about running more then 1 scar window.

P.s. there is a problem in line 16 with the word until… I dunno what is wrong but yea

item.title: Really easy Request!
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

program New;

const
time=1000;// time between pressing of keys
time2=10;// time to keep the keys pressed
begin
repeat
keydown(17)
keydown(getkeycode('w'))
keydown(getkeycode('s'))
wait(time2)
keyup(17)
keyup(getkeycode('w'))
keyup(getkeycode('s'))
wait(time)
until(isfkeydown(11)=true)
keyup(17)
keyup(getkeycode('w'))
keyup(getkeycode('s'))
end.

I allowed you to modify the waits, so you can have it do it as fast as you want and hold down the keys as long as you want.

Also to end it, press F11, so this wait you wont catch it between keyups and keydowns(and be stuck with the keys down), it simply keyups all of the keys, so your not messed up.

Read full topic
